nycTheatreExcerpt: "This "Othello" is still a once-in-a-lifetime experience  be it for this towering cast or its relatability to this current social moment. The depth is all there, but this production simply does not live up to its performers."

keyPhrases.quote: This production simply does not live up to its performers.
